content: learn how to make a simple yet beautiful crochet coaster set the file contains instructions on how to make a round coasters and coasters holder this is a digital pdf file with a pattern written in english including materials suggestions a crochet diagram and written instruction to help you along the way every round is described in a few steps so i m sure that you will have no problem following along but in case of any troubles feel free to dm me and i m sure i will be able to help you ========================= to make this item you will be able to know some basic crocheting skills including - slip stitches - chains - single_crochet - double_crochet - magic_ring - flo/tlo/blo stitches
